imgDesc.text:
Issue commands and successfully guide the test-play Asha to the end of the route!
When a test-play Asha passes over a Springboard, <color=#ffe14b>instruct the Tepetlisaurus staff to lift the Springboard</color> . When one passes a Paintable Signpost, <color=#ffe14b>command the Asha staff to paint the correct direction on the sign</color> to keep them moving forward. If the test-play Asha reaches their destination, then the amusement's trial run will be viewed as a success!
